title: Certain Champs I'm worried about in 8.10 and 8.11
body:
(Note: This is an opinion, not a statement. Everone is entitled to their opinion. So be nice to everyone.)

So I have had my fun with the new and updated items, and now I'm here to ruin it for me and others. Here is the list of champs, that I think, is guaranteed to be overpowered in 8.10 and 8.11. 

Yi:
Riot if you read this, give him some type of nerf because with the new IE, maybe patch 8.10, he is going to be a monster. 40% True Damage with Conquer and IE alone, plus his E, that gives him 18-50 (+ 35% AD) extra True Damage. 
Let's take the new IE's damage and see the True damage. 

New IE AD: 80 
Yi's basic AD (Level 7): 79
That's 159 AD together.
That's 63 AD as True Damage.
Level 2 E: 81 True Damage.
You get a total of 144 true damage per hit.

But he has to build crit, yeah, but the funny thing is now IE doubles his Crit chance, fun right. Get an SS and a PD you good, it fits his build path, and he isn't going to give a fuck about you or anyone at that point. He is going to be this super mobile true damage dealing Yasuo who can crit forever. If my team does not give me 3 heavy CC champs and I see Yi on the enemy team, fuck that shit I'm out. Did I mention, the new Essence Reaver lets him Q for eternity when his Ult is active? It does, good luck hitting the motherfucker.

On the topic of Yasuo, yes, Yasuo:
Oh man, is he going to enjoy this the most? Yes, he will. His crit may not be as strong, but he is going to get 100% crit chance on the second item PD or how you want to order it first. True Damage with the new item, woohoo, is he going to be strong.

Sadly, my lovely Quinn:
Quinn is probably the champion most benefiting from Stormrazor and the new IE. One of my game's I dealt 45,000 True Damage. As much as I like my favorite girl to be strong, there are limits. No nerfs needed for Quinn, but Stormrazor and new IE are just way too strong.

Fucking Hell Riot as if he isn't strong enough, ZED:
Oh my fucking lord riot. He does way to much damage, and the new item doesn't make it better. Crit and Duskblade, I'm just going somewhere else to die, maybe to Minion Sticks.

Vayne, huh, why Vayne:
Seriously Riot, she was a massive problem a year ago, why are we going back to that. She is going to be, pick or ban again.

KAI'SA:
Kai'sa is already overwhelming as hell, especially if she's ahead, now it's going to be even more fun. I just love, to get more than 75% of my health cut off by an auto attack (Auto Attack, not an ability, a fucking Auto Attack. Unblockable, unless if your Teemo, your a peach of shit.), not two abilities like Zoe that only does 50%, no, four fucking auto attacks can do the trick. People say's Zoe is brain dead, yeah right, dodge Zoe's abilities and you will find yourself on top of her.

There are probably other champion's, like, Talon and so on. However, this is my list, and champion I have been playing or played against. But Riot, calm the hell down. Tanks are annoying as hell but don't make them unpickable. Too much True Damage and one champion that was a huge problem a year ago, is going to be a huge problem again, and an already overturned champion, is going to be massively overturned. But, oh well, it's not my game.

Let me know what you think.
